alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 7:46AM EDT until July 23 at 8:45AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Newton County in northwestern Indiana... Benton County in northwestern Indiana... Jasper County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 745 AM CDT/845 AM EDT/. * At 646 AM CDT/746 AM EDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kouts to near Roselawn to 6 miles south of Hopkins Park, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rensselaer, DeMotte, Fowler, Kentland, Otterbein, Remington, Morocco, Wheatfield, Roselawn, Oxford, Goodland, Brook, Boswell, Earl Park, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Mount Ayr, Stoutsburg, Foresman and Fair Oaks. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 232. This includes... US 41 Dragway. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
